channel.title: Class Error
channel.description:
Ya thanks a lot.It worked.
But, I added a custom NPC and the class is called GuessingGame. Its messing up my Login Server.
I know there is something wrong in my ls/server. It says class not found, and it couldn't find the main class. Any Help would be Appreciated. I would rather not show the coding to anyone but if its necessary Ill show it to you in a PM.
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii186/Pesterd/class.jpg[/img]

item.title: Class Error
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:16, topic:266300”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=351596.msg2700503#msg2700503 date=1236559875]

can you not read? or google the problem? its saying it can’t find your Server class inside org/rscdaemon/ls, if you added an npc which shoud have gone into org/rscdaemon/server/npchandler/ it should be fine, not sure why you have messed with the ls server class.

your signature is also fail bro…
it was bc I didnt compile it yet… because I had like 6 or 7 errors with it. But i cant read them because my box closes right away so I need to get it to stay. and no i tried doing it from the cmd prompt and it still doesnt work
[/quote]
Wow… fail[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Class Error
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:1, topic:266300”]Ya thanks a lot.It worked.

But, I added a custom NPC and the class is called GuessingGame. Its messing up my Login Server.

I know there is something wrong in my ls/server. It says class not found, and it couldn’t find the main class. Any Help would be Appreciated.
I would rather not show the coding to anyone but if its necessary Ill show it to you in a PM.

[/quote]

Did you compile first?? If so, did you get errors?? If so, post the compiler output error here.

If non of the above, did you add it correctly to Npchandler? Did you make sure there was no duplication of npc’s?

If you think its your code, then pm it to me and i’ll hace a look through it. Don’t worry, I dont leech.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Error
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:4, topic:266300”]First of all i bet you did not code the npc i think you just modifide someone elses.
second you have to place the npc in the NpcHandlers.xml int for what id should have (someone that already exist)[/quote]
actually i did code it all by myself as a matter of fact and I would show you but^^^^^= WRONG bro…

Its because I didnt compile it yet bc of the errors and I didnt just copy someone elses code…

It wasnt added yet it was part of my RSC Development project and I have many Other NPC’s that no one has besides for Dark Quest and RSCA…

Read full topic
